creditline: Gift of Mrs. Folwell W. Coan
description: brise, bone with shaped, carved panels in two tiers framing silk medallions painted with flowers, figures, and birds; in the central row of panels garlands of flowers alternate with the monogram for Henry II and Catherine de Medicii; ivory sticks decorated in pique work (many inlays missing); on the guards painted silk panels with a crowned F for Francis I and a crowned D for Diane de Poitiers
title: Fan
